To: Japanese Ambassador to Manchukuo Umetsu Yoshijirō

Jews are being seriously persecuted by the Nazi regime. It is not an exaggeration to say that those fellow [Jews] living in Germany are suffering from tremendous hardship. This time when they left Germany their properties were confiscated and they were not allowed to bring funds or clothing….
